ImageProcessor¶

class imageprocessor.ImageProcessor(from_csv=None, target_labels=None, datapath=None, target_dimensions=None, raw_dimensions=None, csv_label_col=None, csv_image_col=None, augment_data=False, rgb=False, channels=3)[source]¶

Contains various image preprocessing methods.

Parameters:
  • from_csv – if true, images will be extracted from csv file
  • target_labels – list of target label values/strings
  • datapath – location of image dataset
  • target_dimensions – final dimensions of training images
  • raw_dimensions – initial dimensions of raw training images
  • csv_label_col – index of label value column in csv
  • csv_image_col – index of image column in csv
  • rgb – true if images are in rgb
  • channels – number of desired channels. if raw images are grayscale, may still want 3 channels for desired neural net input
get_training_data()[source]¶
Returns:list of images from specified location with preliminary processing applied
